Lyric:
[by:请叫我americangirl]
[ti:]
[ar:]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:01.09]There's a letter sealed and unopened for you
[00:05.73]All the words that I can't seem to get out in person
[00:10.03]I'm bad with that but you know that all too well
[00:18.52]There's a moment set aside for you
[00:23.02]But I'll probably neglect to reach out to you again
[00:27.32]It's harder now and you're all I've got
[00:35.26]Whoa, caught in my own scheme
[00:39.81]Whoa, stuck in a bad dream
[00:46.63]Where I keep calling you but there's no answer
[00:51.19]Just a multitude of questions left to chance
[00:54.79]And I don't know why you keep saying things will be alright
[01:04.25]I know these storms will come, let it rain let it pour on me
[01:10.42]You're my umbrella in a raging sea
[01:14.92]I won't give in to the insanity, chasing all the stars
[01:38.84]There's a silence staring me down
[01:43.19]If I could see you I bet I'd break in half
[01:47.74]But there's a disconnect, I can see it's tearing us apart
[01:56.13]There's a promise I made that I can't keep
[02:00.74]All my regret testifies that I am
[02:04.63]Far from flawless always reckless, can I borrow your forgiveness
[02:09.22]I say I need some space but all we've got are
[02:15.69]Whoa, oceans between us
[02:17.52]Whoa, separating
[02:22.32]And I keep calling you but there's no answer
[02:26.97]Just a multitude of questions left to chance
[02:30.40]And I don't know why you keep saying things will be alright
[02:39.96]I know these storms will come, let it rain let it pour on me
[02:45.37]You're my umbrella in a raging sea
[02:50.43]I won't give in to the insanity, chasing all the stars
